Blacknightmare:

Blacknightmare excused to Hellplague and and walked around looking 
for siome blacnkets. Rain was strong and cold was arrainsing. 

She didn't noticed the sounds That came from Hatch, where she came 
in...

Her surprice was big when she saw a bot there that she was 
speechless.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Alex Sell <kraftlos@g...> wrote:
> The body of water turned out to be a mirage.  Celeron felt stupid 
that
> he fallen for such a simple illusion.  Now he had no idea where he
> was, so he just picked a random direction and started walking,
> running, and flying.  Taking quick breaks when needed.
> 
> After about 4 hours of random wandering, making sure that he was
> heading in the same direction and not in circles.  He detected a 
large
> metal mass on the horizon and decided to alter course to see what 
it
> was.  Upon further inspection he found that it was a medium-sized
> crashed ship.  It was nothing like that prision ship monstrousity 
that
> he had been involved with before.  He wasn't even sure how long ago
> that was, or how he got here.  He could be right near the prision
> ship, or this place could be on the other side of the planet.
> 
> His adventerous obcession kicked in, and thinking he could find 
some
> useful parts, or even some information he located a hatch, opened 
it
> and began an organized search of the first areas he came to.
